Description.Name: Thumper Cannon
Description.Details:
The Thumper Cannon is an integrated, heavy artillery piece mounted on the Bull Shark. When fired, it deals devastating damage to all units within the targeted area - often destroying lighter 'Mechs and vehicles entirely.

Only a single artillery piece may be mounted on any 'Mech.

Description.Name: THUMPER FIRE
Description.Details: Activated ability (uses Firing action). Fires an artillery attack at target location for area effect damage. Has limited uses per mission.
